message: That's why i love Mac because it's a creative platform that unleash creativity!
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Faster and safer than typing a password. Just Knock. For iPhone + Mac.
caption: knocktounlock.com
description: A faster, safer way to sign in.You keep your iPhone with you all the time. Now you can use it as a password. You never have to open the app— just knock on your phone twice, even when it’s in your pocket, and you're in.What if my phone is lost or stolen? Stolen phone-proofLost or stolen phone? Simply...
